ItemDesc: Upon use, one of the following effects will be randomly applied to all allies: Serious Professor Owl — DMG dealt increases by <unbreak>36%</unbreak>. Mischievous Origami Bird — DMG taken increases by <unbreak>10%</unbreak>.
ItemBGDesc: A limited-edition version of Dreamville-themed food, offered exclusively in Clock Studios Theme Park. Although the name seems a bit disturbing, it's actually just some really tasty fried chicken.\n\n"Why is there so much mustard in the Birdie Bucket!?"
